1.title: Clip: Cherry Tree Hills Exploration
1.plot: Brian of Level-N explores Cherry Tree Hills, the starting area in Lego City Undercover. It bears a very similar resemblance to San Francisco. We show you just a little bit of what this free roam area has to offer like studs, bricks, and character unlocks.

2.title: Clip: Auburn Exploration
2.plot: Brian of Level-N explores Auburn, a docking bay area in Lego City Undercover. We show you just a little bit of what this free roam area has to offer like studs, bricks, and character unlocks.

3.title: Clip: Auburn Bay Bridge Exploration
3.plot: Brian of Level-N checks out the Auburn Bay Bridge in Lego City Undercover. We show you just a little bit of what this free roam area has to offer like studs, bricks, and character unlocks.

4.title: Clip: Blackwell Bridge Exploration
4.plot: Brian very quickly shows you what Blackwell bridge has to offer. Not much to explore here, but we show you most of what it has to offer in terms of goodies.

5.title: Clip: Bluebell National Park Exploration
5.plot: Brian shows you Bluebell National Park in Lego City Undercover. Maybe Ranger Stone can help us find us some bears, fish, and hawks. We show you just a little bit of what this free roam area has to offer like studs, bricks, and character unlocks.

6.title: Clip: Fort Meadows Explorations
6.plot: Today, we showcase For Meadows. Although there's much more than just a fort here, we show you most of the little things in this area. Plus, we explore a farm.

7.title: Clip: Lego City Airport Exploration
7.plot: Let's go to the airport!Fly into this episode as Brian showcases Lego City's Airport. We show you just a little bit of what this free roam area has to offer like studs, bricks, and character unlocks.

8.title: Clip: Uptown Exploration
8.plot: Let's explore Uptown. Museums, skyscrapers, and much more await Brian in this free roam video. We show you just a little bit of what this free roam area has to offer like studs, bricks, and character unlocks.

9.title: Clip: Paradise Exploration
9.plot: Welcome to sunshine. Brian of Level-N showcases a very Los Angeles type location. We show you just a little bit of what this free roam area has to offer like studs, bricks, and character unlocks.

10.title: Clip: Fresco Exploration
10.plot: Mama Mia. We take a semi-deep dive into the Fresco area in Lego City Undercover. We show you just a little bit of what this free roam area has to offer like studs, bricks, and character unlocks.

11.title: Clip: Albatross Island Exploration
11.plot: Ahoy. Brian takes you on an Albatross Island exploration adventure In Lego City Undercover. Lego City Undercover is being played on the Nintendo Switch.

12.title: Clip: Apollo Exploration
12.plot: Brian takes you on an exciting adventure In Lego City Undercover. Lego City Undercover is being played on the Nintendo Switch.

13.title: Clip: Crescent Park Exploration
13.plot: Brian takes you to Crescent Park to explore In Lego City Undercover. Lego City Undercover is being played on the Nintendo Switch.

14.title: Clip: Downtown Exploration
14.plot: Brian takes you on a downtown adventure In Lego City Undercover. Lego City Undercover is being played on the Nintendo Switch.

15.title: Clip: Festival Square Exploration
15.plot: Brian takes you to the festival square In Lego City Undercover. Lego City Undercover is being played on the Nintendo Switch.

16.title: Clip: Heritage Bridge Exploration
16.plot: Brian takes you on an adventure on the heritage bridge In Lego City Undercover. Lego City Undercover is being played on the Nintendo Switch.

17.title: Clip: King's Court Exploration
17.plot: Brian takes you on a royal adventure into King's court In Lego City Undercover. Lego City Undercover is being played on the Nintendo Switch.

18.title: Clip: Lady Liberty Island Exploration
18.plot: Ahoy. Brian takes you on a trip to a special island where lady liberty stands tall In Lego City Undercover. Lego City Undercover is being played on the Nintendo Switch.

1.title: Clip: Prologue & New Faces and Old Enemies
1.plot: Level-N plays through Chapter 2 of Lego City Undercover on the Nintendo Switch, Blast from the Past.

2.title: Clip: Chapter 2 - Blast from the Past
2.plot: Let's kick off the chase once again. Lego City Undercover loses it's Wii-U exclusivity, and we benefit by playing on the Nintendo Switch.

3.title: Clip: Trouble in Stir (Chapter 3, Part 1)
3.plot: Looks like we got the "Go to Jail" card early on this time. I guess they don't call it Lego City "Undercover" for no reason. Watch as Brian takes helm of Chase McCain and gets him a sweet new robber ability.

4.title: Clip: Miner Altercation (Chapter 3, Part 2)
4.plot: We dive into the mines of Lego City. I always wondered how Lego City had a mine, volcano, and jungle sub-themes in it. I guess this explains it.

5.title: Clip: Kung Fool (Chapter 4)
5.plot: We learn - Kung Foo? Aren't we supposed to be a cop? Don't we have batons and a gun of some sort for these types of things? I guess not.

6.title: Clip: Undercover (Chapter 5)
6.plot: Let's drive around and do some meaningless tasks for some bad guys. That's always fun and exciting right? Of course not, but that's what Chase McCain needs to do to capture Rex Fury.

7.title: Clip: Moe DeLuca's Busy Work (Chapter 6, Part 1)
7.plot: Let's free this Blackwell guy out of prison. I'm continuously surprised that the police haven't discovered that I'm undercover - I guess they didn't get the memo.

8.title: Clip: Dirty Work (Chapter 6, Part 2)
8.plot: I never wanted to be knee deep in sewage.. I guess nightmares have to come to life one day. Might as well be today right. Whatever it takes to steal a giant green gem.

9.title: Clip: Astronaughty (Chapter 7)
9.plot: Spaceship spaceship spaceship. Ah- wrong franchise - We head to Apollo Island to steal a moon buggy of all things. We should've just stolen the whole rocket.

10.title: Clip: Scrapyard Scrap (Chapter 8)
10.plot: Studky and Clutch think they're doing us this massive favor by aiding us in the junkyard. They haven't done jack. We'll save Natalia on our own in this episode of Lego City Undercover on the Nintendo Switch.

11.title: Clip: Bringing Home the Bacon (Chapter 9)
11.plot: Looks like we're going down to the farm. Let's get those little piggies back where they belong in Chapter 9 of Lego City Undercover on the Nintendo Switch. You'd be amazed how far a pig can travel.

12.title: Clip: Uptown Museum (Chapter 10)
12.plot: Let's go all "Night at the Museum" on this level, and steal a dinosaur. If only they made these cool looking lego sets in real life.

13.title: Clip: Lego City Fire Department (Chapter 10)
13.plot: Now on our list of occupations, Fireman. Trust me ladies and gentlemen, it's not this easy in real life to be a firemen. It's just the awesomeness of Chase McCain that makes it look so easy. Oh, and we steal a boat too.

14.title: Clip: Hospital Parkour (Chapter 10)
14.plot: I don't think the game can get more monotonous than this - This level took me forever. It's not even an actual level. Ugh. Watch Chase McCain parkour through a hospital obstacle course.

15.title: Clip: A Giant Waste of Everyone's Time!
15.plot: Rooftop to rooftop we go. I absolutely hated this part of the game. I know I'm supposed to be all happy and positive, but Man - This part was dreadful.

16.title: Clip: Blackwell's Mansion Robbery (Chapter 11)
16.plot: Enter the mansion. We break in the only way we know how, through the sewers.

17.title: Clip: Pappalardo's Ice Cream Parlor (Chapter 11)
17.plot: Attack the ice cream parlor. I guess now we're saving the bad guys, from the bad guys. At least we can stop for delicious ice cream along the way there.

18.title: Clip: Construction Yard (Chapter 12)
18.plot: Get to the construction yard. Let's navigate the construction yard with the help of pseudo-Arnold so we can steal a crane!Plus, we get another semi-cool ability.

19.title: Clip: Telescopic Failure! (Chapter 12)
19.plot: It seems our plan to steal a telescope has been bamboozled by the flaws in the game. I was so close too. Luckily the powers of editing are always on my side.

20.title: Clip: Secret Base (Chapter 13)
20.plot: We're finally going to capture Rex Fury - Or so we think - There's still a few missions left according to the walk through, so this can't be the final episode - Something about an unidentified flying object too I guess.

21.title: Clip: Blackwell's Mansion Investigation
21.plot: Now we get down to the nitty gritty - The true invasion of Blackwell's mansion is here. Let's find out what his true plan for Lego City is.

22.title: Clip: Time for Liftoff! (Chapter 14)
22.plot: So I guess this skyscraper inconspicuously hid a giant rocket in the middle of Lego City this whole time - It's now our job to stop it however we can. join us for this epic episode of Lego City Undercover.

23.title: Clip: Fly Me to the Moon (Finale, Chapter 15)
23.plot: It's time, ladies and gentlemen, cats and dogs, bricks and blocks. We get Rex Fury and save Lego City. Thanks for tuning in to my play through of Lego City Undercover on the Nintendo Switch.

imdb.title: Clip: Lego City Undercover
plot: It's BabyFirst Halloween Special with all your favorite shows.
